Chuck was swallowed and was forced down Sarah's esophagus and into her stomach.
He landed in a pile of mush the must have been Sarah's dinner.
Then it dawned on him, he was Sarah's food and even though she loved him her stomach would digest him and he would end up a pile of nutrients like what he was sitting in.

A plan hits him if he were to cover himself completely the stomach might miss him and he could try and escape.

does it work ?
115112221.title: Sarah's small meal

1151122211.content:
Chuck covers himself in the nutrient mush and waits.
The walls of Sarah stomach start to expand and contract causing Chuck and the rest the mush to be squeezed together.
Acid begins to seep into Sarah's stomach and it burns Chuck's skin, he panics and struggles only causing the release of more acid.

After about half a hour all that is left is a small pile of mush that is dropped into Sarah's intestines, most of it is absorbed by her and even though she is too worried to notice her breasts become slightly larger and her ass firms.

After a day of searching Sarah returns to her apartment, a few hours later she goes to the toliet and what is left of Chuck slips out her ass.
1151122211.title: digested

1151122212.content:
Chuck covered himself in the mush then waited.
The walls of Sarah stomach started to expand and contract pushing Chuck and the mush downwards, moments later the ground gave way underneath him and Chuck was pitched into Sarah's intestine.

The fall had shaken him and was laying in the mush around him when it began to move slowly down her intestine,churning and missing with juice form the intestine , the layer of mush protects Chuck from the most of the digestive juices but his skin still stings slightly.

After about 2 hours, the mush on and around is beginning to turn brown and compact together into lumps.

Another 15 minutes later Chuck was encased up to his head in shit and was only about 1inch away from Sarah's ass hole.

#Sarah POV#

Sarah and Casey had search the entire restaurant for Chuck and there was no sign, General Beckman had ordered them to stop searching just before midnight and told them the search would continue tomorrow with the help of more agents.

She had retuned to her apartment and was not able to sleep.

She went into the bathroom sat down on the toilet and had a huge shit.

#Chuck POV#

Chuck felt a slight pressure around him and Sarah's ass hole opened wide, he got a view of the toilet bowl beneath.
It could not end this way, not as a piece of Sarah's shit.
He tried to free his arms so he could grab one of Sarah's butt hair and stop himself from falling
1151122212.title: Yes too well

11511222121.content:
Chuck misses Sarah's hair and plunges into the gleaming white bowl beneath.
He dragged down into the water and gasps for air as the shit he is stuck in resurfaces.
more pieces of shit land around him then the darkness lift.
Sarah wipes her ass and drops the paper in.
Chuck screams....

Sarah.....
11511222121.title: going down with the shit

115112221212.content:
Sarah reaches across to the handle and flushes the toilet.
A torrent of water crashes down into the bowl, churning the surface and pushing Chuck down.
As the peice of crap Chuck is trapped in sink deeper down the pipe, Water and piss starts to fills his lungs.
The edge of his vision becomes dark, slowly expanding across hie eyes until he blacks out and drowns.
115112221212.title: The depths

11511222122.content: Chuck wiggles his arm free in time to grab a hand of Sarah's butt hair as the shit he was trapped in fell he was tugged out and left dangling above the massive toilet. Chuck sighed with relief at his luck when realiz ed it was not over. A huge sheet of toilet roll flies at chuck and pulled at him as it brushed past he holds tightly on the hair as it comes past again and.....
11511222122.title: Yes he is free

choices: He and Sarah were in a Cage
They were still in the kitchen
In a dark place barely lit
1152.content:
Sarah is hit aswell and slumped to the tile floor.

"What should we do with them ?" asks a agent as he stepped round the counter.
" we'll record the effects of the weapon then we'll decide what to do next" relied the woman who had fired the gun.
Taking out a camera to take pictures of the shrunken bodies infront of her.
As Chuck awoke, he saw Sarah limp body lying next to him, he checked her pulse.
"good atleast she alright" Sighed Chuck in relief. He took a look around at his surrondings.

info.description:
Characters from the Tv Show Chuck on Channel1 shrink. Please add

Chuck: a normal guy who becomes involved in the world of spies when a computer program is downloaded into his head. he is in love with his handler Sarah walker
http://www.collider.com/wp-content/image-base/TV/C/Chuck_NBC/chuck_nbc_tv_show__...

Sarah walker: A spy Sarah is made Chucks handler, She has fallen for the helpless Chuck, Her cover is as Chuck's girlfriend.
http://l.yimg.com/img.tv.yahoo.com/tv/us/img/site/33/62/0000043362_2007092412271...

Morgan: Chuck's best friend does not know Chuck's a spy. Anna: Morgan's girlfriend, a hot Japanese girl Acts very sluty
http://season1.fr/images/chuck_morgan-anna.jpg

Ellie and Devon: Chucks older sister who is over protective of Chuck and Her Boyfriend who is the super fit try everything at least once kind of guy. Chuck lives in their apartment. Their both doctors
http://2.bp.blogspot.com/_oFN5FV7Qr9c/SNPa0SZPkTI/AAAAAAAAAZs/ajW6LFkEFV0/s400/e...

John Casey: Casey is the real tough guy type love fighting, guns thinks Chuck is weak and useless, hes Chuck's other handler
http://chuck-nbc.wikia.com/wiki/File:Adama.jpg

to find out anything you want about chuck click here.
